headline: Is Zoetis Now an Opportunity After Its 2025 Share Price Pullback?
summary: If you are wondering whether Zoetis is starting to look like a bargain after its big pullback, you are not alone. This piece will walk through whether the current price makes sense for long term investors. The stock has slid to around $117.66, with returns of about -2.3% over the last week, -2.0% over the last month, and a much steeper -27.6% year to date. This has raised fresh questions about whether the market has overreacted to changing expectations. Recently, Zoetis has been in the...
